project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the received data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement functionality to prompt the user for a city name
Display the fetched weather information (temperature, humidity, weather conditions) in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and data parsing functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
